page.title: 05A Pre-School Child's Day
page.content: Andrew Philip Woods (3), whose father is the stockman on the Barton Abbey Estate, and who lives at Leys Farm, goes to Middle Barton play group on Monday and Wednesday mornings and Friday afternoon. When he comes home at lunchtime he might bring a friend with him, or go to his friend's house until his sister is collected at 3.00 pm. He has lunch with his father when he is at home. He plays with his friend or his mother on the swing or slide or climbing frame in the garden. He also like jigsaw puzzles very much. He helps to feed the chickens and bantams and geese which his mother keeps.
